Medical Missionaries to be Thoroughly Educated in Bible Lines. 

J. 178'03 (Aug. 2 '03):-- 


     The very same reasons that were given for the removal of the old Battle Creek College from Battle Creek, should now lead our brethren to decide to train in other places the youth who now expect to prepare themselves for medical missionary (97) work. Those who expect to become medical missionary workers must be thoroughly educated in Bible lines. They should have the very best spiritual advantages, in order that they may be fitted to teach and to train others.
